MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY21 postcode area of Welshpool, affecting properties in Berriew and surrounding area.  We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:06PM . Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on the overhead line network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 11:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 21:42PM on 18th April 2021.
